response.summary:
Professional in Electronics Engineering with 15+ years of experience working in IT. Managing Corporate Services and IT Support areas. Performing as Team Leader, Systems Administrator and Critical Services’ accountant, covering from workstations to production environments, virtualization and cloud ecosystems.

Client facing experience helping customers migrating from on-prem to cloud services.
A service oriented & Agile driven team leader with great personal relationships, convinced that best results are obtained as a the outcome of structured teamwork.

Strong DevOps experience from last 7 years.
A DevOps professional aiming to bridge the gap between development and operations, striving to deliver high-quality software at a faster rate. With a strong background in IT operations and also having a deep understanding of the entire software development lifecycle, from planning and development to deployment and maintenance.

Fond of automating processes, optimizing infrastructure, and implementing continuous integration and delivery pipelines. Passionate about leveraging the latest tools and technologies to ensure that software development teams can work more efficiently and effectively, while also ensuring that end-users receive the highest-quality software possible.

In addition to technical skills, I also have strong communication and collaboration abilities, allowing me to effectively work with cross-functional teams to ensure that projects are completed on time and on budget. I am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices, and I am always looking for ways to improve my skills and knowledge.

Let's get in touch!!
response.skills: Mentoring, Containerization, Python (Programming Language), Scripting, Prompt Engineering, Bash, Infrastructure Management, New Relic APM, Monitoring, Terraform, Continuous Integration, Infrastructure, Jenkins, Ansible, Linux System Administration, Scrum, Cloud Computing, Shell Scripting, Project Management, Telecommunications

profile_positions.description:
AUTODESK, Media and Entertainment Division.

• Collaborated with client's technological teams and media producers to develop comprehensive migration plans for transitioning on-premise content and media management applications to cloud-based solutions.
• Led the migration of cloud solutions from standard offerings to customized setups, enhancing functionality and delivering additional features.
• Led the release management process for production deployments, as well as other important, business-driven, release tracks.
• Owner and accountable for the release management process and publishing of the application packages to support legacy clients.
• Worked closely with stakeholders to define and design efficient cloud architectures and infrastructure, ensuring optimal performance and scalability.
• Implemented best practices in cloud engineering and DevOps methodologies to streamline development, testing, deployment, and maintenance processes.
• Contributed to the successful delivery of projects, meeting client requirements and timelines.
• Provided technical expertise and support to ensure smooth and efficient operations of cloud-based
solutions.
• Actively stayed abreast of emerging trends and technologies in cloud computing and DevOps, incorporating innovative solutions into projects.
profile_positions.title: Cloud Engineer

profile_positions.description:
OPORTUN, Fintech.

• Senior reference in the Cloud Infrastructure and Product Reliability team– CIPR.
• Responsible for the CI/CD incorporated in the SDLC.
• Working closely with the development teams in order to cover the gap between code development and production releases.
• Deliver effective tools and solutions for Engineering so they can focus on the code development.
• Lead Devops Engineer on dedicated Engineering teams.
• Drive Release tasks to achieve the weekly deployments to production.
• Contribute to troubleshooting, debugging and solving issues in all environments.
• Maintain and develop the IaC for the solutions.
profile_positions.title: Cloud Engineer

profile_positions.description: Design, Develop & Integrate solutions based on different AWS cloud technologies
profile_positions.title: Cloud Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Accountable for the company's IT Infrastructure, Service Desk operation, SLA's compliance, Clients' Services, Corporate Services. Setting the north for the company's technology growth.

AWS platform & Cloud Ecosystem administrator for Company & Clients. Involved on different IT & DevOps projects with clients and within the company, securing & monitoring IT Servers' platform—always guided by agile driven frameworks.

As part of GLT—GAP Leadership Team, I contributed on every collaborator's well-being at the company, transmitted company's core values & lead by the example.

Accountable for setting IT Department's goals aligned towards company's, responsible for personal & professional growth of team members & co-workers.

Achievements:
+ Lead & Contribute to company's expansion in LATAM.
+ DevOps implementation for clients, including Production, Staging & Development environments—integrating Heroku, Wercker & Git technologies.
+ Monthly Award Recognition for contribution on different company projects.
+ Hoteling solution implementation & Product Owner for Medellin Office, @RutaN—Workspace optimization. 
+ SLAs and ITIL driven Service Desk implementation—metrics, customer satisfaction, service requests & incidents. 
+ Azure platform maintenance & backup plan design, including servers, DB’s, Security, Access.
+ Incident Management Drill implementation on for MSDF 'Scholarsnapp' project.
+ Backup plan design & roll out for company's most critical servers—hosted on both, on-premises VMWare & AWS.
+ Vulnerabilities assessment and mitigation on critical servers.

Roles:
Personal Manager | GAP Leadership Team | IT Lead | DevOps Practice | Personal Manager Practice
profile_positions.title: IT Lead

profile_positions.description:
Manage IT services over both, On-Premises and Cloud platforms, such as VPS’, Corporate Cloud
Services, Intranet, VPN, WebSites, Network Services, Virtualization Environment, PBX, over
offshore office policies.

Ensure the correct execution of every release deploy for both, production and testing
environments, located at different countries of the EuroZone and running the innovation
management system implemented on the company's' clients over the Nordic Countries.

Keep on the good performance of the IT, Infrastructure & Support area, delivering high
quality services with global standards.

Design and manage the failover solution that supports production and testing
environments.

Report status and maintain excellent communication channel to main office at Oslo.

Satisfy internal and external clients' needs, according to established SLA's and OLA's.

Achievements:
● Design & Implementation for failover solution to ensure high availability for the
Production Environment.
● Automation for every deploy process, either for Production and Testing
Environments.
● Management & Support for locally Virtualized Servers and Cloud VPS.
● Design, Implement and Manage backup solution for the company’s critical mission
servers.
● Vulnerability Assessment to detect potential threats.
● Change Management system implementation.
● Cali Office Network Design and Implementation.
● Installation and Management of several mid-size servers to provide services such as the Distributed Version Control System for the developers to improve their workflow, the Project Management and Issue Tracking Tool, the Automation Tool for QA, the PBX, to mention a few.
profile_positions.title: IT Infrastructure & Support Lead

profile_positions.description:
Assure Tecolsof’s technological infrastructure availability in order to deliver previously
agreed services with internal and external clients, based on mutually established SLA’s and
OLA’s.

Achievements:
● 22,6% operational cost reduction for telecommunications platform, including
dedicated internet and 3 private MPLS networks enabled to support Coomeva’s
HelpDesk Services.
● Corporate email migration, from local on­premise service to Microsoft Exchange
Online, using Microsoft Partner’s licences, freeing up this particular service’s costs.
● Change Management system implementation.
● Windows Server 2008 R2 Active Directory implementation on “Curaduría Urbana
Number 2” headquarters.
● Coomeva’s Service Desk technological platform stabilization.
● Office365 implementation project at Cartones América.
● Company’s Active Directory Mirror implementation (Windows 2003 Small
Business).
● Coomeva’s Alternate Operations Site management.
● Corporate Proxy implementation.
profile_positions.title: Technology Manager

profile_positions.description:
Manage the IT Support & Infrastructure area and Process Leader within Quality
Management Integrated System. Responsible for ensuring company’s optimal performance
by reducing technological platform DownTimes to it’s minimun.

Achievements:
● Production Environment Platform Upgrade Project, migrating from IBM POWER
P570 towards a P710 BladeSystem.
● Physical Servers integration into Virtual Farm with VMWare technology over
HADR (High Availability Disaster Recovery) INTEL XEON Blades.
● BackUp Solution for Production Environment implementation and management,
with IBM Tivoli Storage Manager.
● Telephony Platform Upgrade Project, migrating from analog Nortel BCM to
Asterisk; reducing monthly telephony fees by 33,3%
● End­user Workstations Technological Upgrade Project.
● Active participation on certification and recertification process, under the norm NTC
ISO 9001:2008, and the norm NTC GP 1000:2009, assuming Technological
Support Process Leader role.
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Lead

profile_positions.description:
Technical Support Professional on office software, corporate email, networking (wireless and
ethernet), electrical grids, Windows OS and Information Systems used by the company,
including LENIX, the Tax Management System.

Achievements:
● Call Center Service Implementation with Nortel Networks BCM400, avoiding third
party costs.
● Printing Supplies Cost Reduction by 58.9%, unifying printers’ models and
references, upgrading to newer machines, focusing on the most commercial
manufacturers, reducing also printers’ support and maintenance fees.
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Professional

profile_positions.description:
In charge of branch opening and marketing strategies for Costa Atlántica region, located at
Barranquilla, under Home Office type of work, supporting established clients and opening
the new market.

Identifying and exploiting new business opportunities on the Caribbean region.

Design of integrated technology services’ solutions on technical, commercial and economic
bearings.
profile_positions.title: Technical Marketing Engineer

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com
